alert.note: Alert for Hood Canal Area; Lower Chehalis Valley Area; Southwest Interior; Tacoma Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 2:55AM PST until February 23 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Lowlands of Thurston, western Lewis, and far southeast Mason Counties, including Harstine Island, Olympia, Centralia, and Toledo, Tacoma and vicinity, including Vaughn, Gig Harbor, Fox Island, Anderson Island, DuPont, Puyallup, and Spanaway, Western Kitsap and the lowlands of eastern Jefferson and Mason Counties, including Brinnon, Seabeck, and Shelton and Far southwest Mason County and the interior lowlands of Grays Harbor County, including Matlock, McCleary, and Montesano. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light to moderate areas of snow have persisted through the night so far, and may linger into the early morning bringing light additional snowfall amounts to the area. Local amounts of an additional 1 to 2 inches may occur through the 7 AM time frame.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Hood Canal Area; Lower Chehalis Valley Area; Southwest Interior; Tacoma Area
